org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator

Class OptimizationOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.portfolioconstruction.allocator.OptimizationOutput
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForwardReverseOptimizationOutput

    public class OptimizationOutput
extends java.lang.Object
    OptimizationOutput holds the Output of an Optimal Portfolio Construction Run, i.e., the Optimal Asset Weights in the Portfolio and the related Portfolio Metrics.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
